text: Hagi Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe Anumzamo'a huno, Ha' vahe'mo'za e'za Babiloni mopamo'a witima refuzafuma nepaza kumakna hu'neankino witima refuzafuma nepazankna hu'za zamazeri haviza hugahaze. Ana hu'neankino witima hamareankna huno ana vahe'ma zamazeri havizama hania knamo'a hago egofta hu'ne.
